content:
I think there might be some confusion! You mentioned your appointment is on Thursday, March 1st, but your mom's surgery is on March 15th. That means her surgery hasn't happened yet, and she won't be recovering from it by the time of your appointment.

You might want to consider reaching out to your mom to offer support and check in with her before her surgery, or plan a visit for after her surgery when she's recovering. It's great that you're thinking of her and wanting to support her during this time!
